schema_version.description: The version of the schema used to create this scheme definition. Currently 2-0-0

name.description: The canonical name of the primer scheme (lowercase)

display_name.description: The human-friendly display name of the primer scheme

organism.description: The organism to which this primer scheme refers in lowercase, e.g. sars-cov-2

developers.description: Persons or organisations responsible for developing the primer scheme

name.description: Descriptive name of the person or organisation

url.description: URL to identifier for person or organisation. For person, links to ORCID profiles are preferred

vendors.description: Vendors where one can purchase the primers described in the amplicon scheme or a kit containing these primers

url.description: URL describing primer panel kit or product

kit_name.description: Vendor-specific product name for primer kit

amplicon_size.description: The length (in base pairs) of an amplicon in the primer scheme

repository_url.description: URL of the primer scheme repository

primer_checksum.description: Checksum for the primer scheme BED file, in format checksum_type:checksum, where checksum_type is lowercase name of checksum generator e.g. primaschema

reference_checksum.description: Checksum for the reference FASTA file, in format checksum_type:checksum, where checksum_type is lowercase name of checksum generator e.g. primaschema

citations.description: URLs of publications describing the scheme (DOIs preferred when available)

derived_from.description: Canonical name of the primer scheme from which this scheme was derived

deprecated.description: Whether the primer scheme is deprecated and should not longer be used
